Container.Name: Oscam-test
Container.Overview: This is a test build with my own compiled oscam binary with support for libusb and pcsc[br] Oscam is a card server and client for decoding DVB streams over DVB-S, DVB-C, DVB-T or IPTV using a subscription card.
Container.Description: This is a test build with my own compiled oscam binary with support for libusb and pcsc[br] Oscam is a card server and client for decoding DVB streams over DVB-S, DVB-C, DVB-T or IPTV.[br] http://www.streamboard.tv/oscam/[br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : This is where Oscam will store it\'s configuration.[br][br]
